title: naTavara taruNi saha rAsavilAsa
sahitya:
naTavara taruNi saha rAsavilAsa nava navamaNI 
gaNa viracita makuTa dharaNa mrduLa caraNa


P:  naTavara taruNi saha rAsavilAsa nava navamaNI 
gaNa viracita makuTa dharaNa mrduLa caraNa
A:  kiTajham tarikiTadhIm taritAm takatika tOm 
taka dhimi sunandana tara mandara giri sundara
				(catusragati)
su-lalita vapuSa mukAmbuja pari vikalanmukta gItAmrta rasikA 
jaladha paTala ghana calasama kOmala kusuma daLa kalabha sharIrA
sulabha sama naTana vrajayuti jana sumana ramita gambhIrA 
haladhara sOdara harE muraLIdhara ati karuNAkara
